Articles.Content: i have no idea how to use liquid fuel tanks and would appreciate some help
All you gotta do is put an engine (the black, thick one) underneath it. To use, press Shift to throttle up, and Control to throttle down. Press X to turn off engines quickly.

Fuel tanks are made to be placed directly above 'Liquid Fuel Engines', or LFE\'s. From there on the LFE\'s use the fuel until it is out, and the amount it uses will depend on your throttle. The fuel is used up from top to bottom, permitting you have a stack of fuel tanks.

Alternatively, fuel lines can direct indirectly attached tanks to flow to an engine by clicking the fuel tank you want to get fuel from, and place it ontop of another fuel tank, which in turn is directly above/or in a stack upon the LFE.

Hope this helped!
